name: Black Sheep in Circus
description:
Entry for GameOff 2022 Jam.
Work in progress

Try reaching end of the level by jumping from one ball to the next. Try landing as close to top of the ball as possible or you may fall!
Good luck!

Expect some unannounced updates/changes each day until I submit it to Jam.

Feel free to fill survey:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfLYZOY6fTM-UWuz4gkIKcxf-EkTahRjEYKkH2H...

Controls:
WASD = move
Space = jump

Partially supports controller
